channel.title: osmnx on Ben's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in osmnx on Ben's Blog

item.title: Satellite imagery classification - II
item.description: Context and Content This is the second part of a three parts series about using remote sensing data to classify the earth’s surface. Please read the first part of the series if you are interested in an introduction to the post series and / or in the first part where we downloaded parts of Landsat scenes by leveraging the Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF format. In this part, after a short introduction to OpenStreetMap (OSM), we will download and prepare land use and land cover data sourced from OSM.
